Trade/Device Name(s): skyla Hi Hemoglobin A1c Reagent Kit
Submitter Information: Skyla Corporation Hsinchu Science Park Branch
Regulation Name(s): Discrete photometric chemistry analyzer for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the skyla Hi Hemoglobin A1c System, an in-vitro diagnostic system using an immunoturbidimetric assay to measure HbA1c in whole blood.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of percent concentration of glycated hemoglobin (HbA1c %) in venous and finger-stick capillary whole blood to monitor long-term glycemic control in persons with diagnosed diabetes mellitus; not for screening or diagnosis of diabetes.
